labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It doesn't appear anymore. I also note that this issue was pre-relevent in an old version of Discord Normal.
data.expected_result: The game should load up with the Discord Overlay on the side
data.short_description: Discord Overlay has not appeared since the addition of the game tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up Discord - Check to make sure the game is added, and that you enable Discord Overlay in the settings - Open a game that has the settings enabled
